this_title: The Green Book: Guide to Freedom
introduction: Filmmaker Yoruba Richen's documentary, The Green Book: Guide to Freedom, tells the story of the manual that helped African-Americans find safe places to stay, eat, shop and do business on the road.Yoruba Richen on Fresh Airhttps://www.npr.org/2019/02/25/697667279/guide-to-freedom-documentary-chronicles-the-real-life-green-book?sc=tw
foreign_title: The Green Book: Guide to Freedom
